text.div:
ValueSet allergy intolerance code

Codes as communicated by NIHDI and the FOD Terminology Center differentiating types of allergy intolerance codes. This valueset supports the Belgian federal FHIR profiling effort.

  • Include all codes defined in https://www.ehealth.fgov.be/standards/fhir/ValueSet/be-causativeagent
  • Include all codes defined in https://www.ehealth.fgov.be/standards/fhir/ValueSet/be-noallergy

This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

name: BeAllergyIntoleranceCode
title: ValueSet allergy intolerance code
description: Codes as communicated by NIHDI and the FOD Terminology Center differentiating types of allergy intolerance codes. This valueset supports the Belgian federal FHIR profiling effort.
